documentation.introduction: There are two people Bob and Alice. Alice has n messages and Bob wanted message b. Alice doesn´t want to send him all of her messages and Bob don´t want to tell her b. And the problem how to get exactly one message without revealing which one solves protocol Oblivious transfer 1-n
documentation.usage: This plugin represents Bob. You need to specify three inputs. First input are encrypted messages, second input is index of wanted message and third input is a key for encryption. Plugin decrypts wanted message and puts it on output.
